products.title: Kerry Paradise Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Combining the colour of unblemished sapphires and the soft resilience of its polyester fabric, this blind is undeniably the greatest thing ever invented by man. No joke. Being such a rich colour with so much personality, that this blind will make your home better in every regard is a given. The only danger to ordering this blind is that houseguests may or may not try to steal it, but if they are willing to endanger your friendship for a window blind, then they arent worth it honey.

products.title: Paradise Flamingo Roller Blind
products.description: Wow, these punchy tones are really as vibrant as they look. Vivid pink, green, yellow, purple and blue, plus a touch of orange too. Together they look wild and exotic. And this theme is carried through the jungle pattern too, where layers of foliage and fauna fight to show of wow, these punchy tones are really as vibrant as they look.

products.title: Paradise Raspberry Roller Blind
products.description: Step through the gardens of paradise with this aptly named paradise raspberry roller blind. Its home to an array of exotic species, as well as a stunning palette of colours. The grey background of this design helps to ground the rainbow of shades, offering a soft balance to step through the gardens of paradise with this aptly named paradise raspberry roller blind.
